version_description:
We are proud to announce Lumy 2 with the following update

- 3D Touch supports​ with Peek & Pop and Quick Actions.
- Spotlight Search - Use Spotlight to search photographic times.
- Slide Over and Split View Support- Multitasking on iPad

We are proud to announce Lumy 2 with the following update

- 3D Touch supports​ with Peek & Pop and Quick Actions.
- Spotlight Search - Use Spotlight to search photographic times.
- Slide Over and Split View Support- Multitasking on iPad

- Ability to choose Location Tracking between - "Always" or "When in Use".
- Fixed Bugs with the Today Widget.
- Bug Fixes.

We are proud to announce Lumy 2 with the following update

- 3D Touch supports​ with Peek & Pop and Quick Ac

- Ability to choose Location Tracking between - "Always" or "When in Use".
- Fixed Bugs with the Today Widget.
- Bug Fixes.

We are proud to announce Lumy 2 with the following update

- 3D Touch supports​ with Peek & Pop and Quick Ac

We are proud to announce Lumy 2.1 with the following update

- iOS10 Support
- Speed Improvements
- Fixed Some Bugs

Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)
